hero.title: Platform Lead Engineer
hero.description:
Platform Engineer specializing in large-scale distributed system design and operations (6 years)

Led infrastructure optimization and developer productivity improvements for an MSA-based e-commerce platform. Reduced error detection time by 99%, deployment time by 90%, and infrastructure costs by 50%.

Operates high-availability environments handling 100K daily users, 500GB/day network traffic, 20TB/month data lake, and 3TB/month distributed tracing data.

profile.title: Profile
profile.aboutMeParagraph1: Over 6 years, I've worked across organizations of varying scales, designing and operating scalable distributed systems spanning infrastructure to applications. Starting as a solo full-stack developer at a startup, I now serve as Platform Lead Engineer for an enterprise e-commerce platform with ₩500 billion in annual revenue.
profile.aboutMeParagraph2: Key achievements include reducing error detection time by 99%, deployment cycles by 90%, and infrastructure costs by 50%. I reliably operate services used by 100K daily users, managing a 20TB/month data lake and 3TB of distributed tracing data, enhancing system efficiency and reliability in high-availability environments. Through diverse projects with LG Electronics, SK Telecom, and others, I gained deep understanding of collaboration structures between product managers, designers, and developers, building the capability to design systems that realize business objectives beyond mere technical implementation.
profile.aboutMeParagraph3: My core tech stack centers on Kubernetes and AWS-based cloud-native architectures. On the backend, I develop services and APIs with Django, Spring Boot, and Gin, building reliable messaging and data pipelines using Kafka and Airflow. I've developed frontend applications with React, Vue.js, and Flutter, gaining full-stack experience. Recently, I built an OpenTelemetry-based observability platform that significantly reduced error detection time, and actively contribute to multiple open source projects. Certifications: CKA, LFCS, AWS SysOps, DevOps Professional, Advanced Networking Specialty.
profile.aboutMeParagraph4: Currently serving as SRE for Daewoong Group's TheShop e-commerce platform. I operate Kafka clusters processing 20-50 million daily messages and manage 200+ Airflow DAGs while leading the microservices transformation of legacy systems. Through this process, I reduced deployment time by 90% and cut infrastructure costs in half. Moving forward, I aim to actively adopt AI-based development tools to further elevate development productivity and build a technical culture of collective growth.

monitoring.title: Monitoring System Enhancement
monitoring.subtitle: End-to-End Observability Platform for Legacy Infrastructure
content: June 2024 – Present | Project Lead
Architected unified observability platform migrating from legacy Scouter monitoring to OpenTelemetry, Grafana, Prometheus, and AWS CloudWatch integration
Implemented end-to-end distributed tracing, metrics aggregation, and centralized logging across hybrid environment comprising 10-year legacy monolithic systems and modern microservices architecture
Deployed OpenTelemetry Collectors across 12 production servers with Grafana dashboard integration for real-time monitoring
Reduced mean time to detection (MTTD) by 99%, decreasing error identification from 18 hours to under 10 minutes
Contributing to OpenTelemetry open-source project addressing cloud-native, container orchestration, and AWS integration issues

dataLake.title: Data Lake Architecture & Business Intelligence
dataLake.subtitle: AWS Glue & Athena-Based Analytics Platform
content: Designed and implemented scalable data lake architecture leveraging AWS Glue (Apache Spark) and Athena (Apache Hive) for long-term analytics capabilities
Established S3-based centralized storage infrastructure supporting 10-year data retention with automated lifecycle management
Optimized query performance through Parquet columnar compression and time-partitioned data organization, reducing query latency by 85%
Extended log retention period from 7 days to 10 years (142× expansion), enabling comprehensive historical analysis and regulatory compliance
Developed Grafana business intelligence dashboards visualizing key e-commerce KPIs including customer retention rates, purchase conversion funnels, and cohort analysis
Processing 20TB monthly data volume with sub-second query response for executive reporting

theshop.title: TheShop E-commerce Platform — Site Reliability Engineering
theshop.subtitle: Pharmaceutical & B2B Platform | ₩500 Billion Annual Revenue
content: Lead Site Reliability Engineer responsible for Daewoong Group's mission-critical B2B/B2C e-commerce platform serving ₩500 billion annual transaction volume, 100,000 daily active users, and processing 20TB monthly data
Architected and executed legacy system modernization, migrating Oracle/Tomcat monolith to microservices architecture utilizing Next.js frontend and Spring Boot backend
Implemented 5-node Apache Airflow cluster managing 200+ DAGs for ETL workflows, statistical aggregation, data lake synchronization, and near-realtime change data capture (CDC)
Designed hybrid cloud infrastructure integrating AWS ECS Fargate serverless containers with on-premise Docker environments (CentOS/Ubuntu), ensuring seamless workload distribution
Established centralized API gateway using APISIX and Nginx with rate limiting, circuit breaker patterns, and dynamic service discovery via Spring Cloud Eureka
Automated infrastructure-as-code provisioning through AWS CloudFormation, achieving 50% monthly cost reduction via EC2 right-sizing and intelligent S3 lifecycle policies
Optimized full-stack performance across React/Next.js frontend, Spring Boot/Node.js microservices, and Oracle database, eliminating critical bottlenecks
Deployed OpenTelemetry observability platform reducing MTTD by 99% (18 hours to 10 minutes) through distributed tracing and metrics correlation
Engineered high-availability Apache Kafka and Redis Sentinel clusters processing 20-50 million messages daily with 99.9% uptime SLA
Delivered 90% deployment cycle time reduction through CI/CD pipeline automation, maintaining zero-downtime releases and significantly improved MTTR

gateway.title: API Gateway & Traffic Management Infrastructure
gateway.subtitle: Enterprise Gateway Integration
content: Integrated enterprise gateway infrastructure across multiple domain endpoints, consolidating authentication and authorization layers
Architected APISIX-based API Gateway with Spring Cloud Eureka service discovery for dynamic microservice routing and load balancing
Implemented comprehensive role-based access control (RBAC) policies governing all API traffic with centralized policy management
Configured high-availability gateway cluster with automatic failover and health monitoring
Optimized platform and back-office service traffic patterns, reducing average API latency by 40%
Successfully validated Kafka streaming and Airflow workflow integration through proof-of-concept implementation

airflow.title: Apache Airflow Workflow Orchestration Platform
airflow.subtitle: Multi-Cluster Architecture for ETL & Real-Time Data Processing
content: Architected and deployed 5 high-availability Apache Airflow clusters supporting enterprise-scale workflow orchestration
Automated complex data workflows including batch ETL processing, change data capture (CDC) synchronization, and statistical aggregation across 200+ directed acyclic graphs (DAGs)
Implemented distributed task execution using PostgreSQL-backed metadata storage and Redis-based message queueing with Celery Executor for parallel processing
Optimized pipeline performance handling 20TB monthly data volume through dynamic task parallelization and resource allocation strategies
Developed comprehensive monitoring solution with real-time Grafana dashboards, PagerDuty alerting, and SLA tracking for pipeline health
Reduced data warehouse refresh cycles by 60% through automated incremental ETL processes, enabling near-realtime analytics

ixiStudio.title: LG IXI Studio — Generative AI Development Platform
ixiStudio.subtitle: Enterprise SaaS for Custom AI Model Management
content: Developed enterprise SaaS platform enabling organizations to create, train, and manage custom generative AI models tailored to business-specific requirements
Implemented real-time AI response streaming using Server-Sent Events (SSE) protocol with sub-100ms initial response latency
Enhanced proof-of-concept deliverables including conversational chat interface and collaborative code editor, meeting aggressive project deadlines
Deployed services on Kubernetes with Istio service mesh for traffic management, observability, and secure inter-service communication
Resolved CodeMirror library Vite pre-rendering build incompatibility through upstream open-source contribution
Integrated advanced data visualization using Konva.js canvas rendering, Element UI components, and Apache ECharts for analytics dashboards
Expanded technical expertise in streaming protocols and WebSocket alternatives for low-latency client-server communication

ixiAdmin.title: LG IXI Admin — AI Model Operations Platform
ixiAdmin.subtitle: Text-to-Speech & NLP Model Configuration Management
content: Developed administrative platform for managing AI model configurations including content filtering rules, hyperparameter tuning, logging systems, and performance monitoring
Administered 15+ AI models in production Kubernetes environment (LG Violet platform) with custom resource definitions and operators
Configured infrastructure resources including Horizontal Pod Autoscalers, Jupyter Notebook allocations, and Argo Workflows using kubectl and Kubernetes APIs
Resolved critical Kubernetes and Istio networking issues through comprehensive integration testing and service mesh troubleshooting
Collaborated with infrastructure team leveraging CKA certification knowledge to diagnose and resolve ECR image registry instabilities
Implemented Web Application Firewall (WAF) rules mitigating XSS and CSRF vulnerabilities, achieving zero security incidents post-deployment

drone.title: SK Drone Fleet Management Platform
drone.subtitle: Real-Time 3D Visualization with Performance Optimization
content: Engineered 3D geospatial visualization system managing 500MB+ terrain model datasets with efficient rendering techniques
Optimized Three.js rendering pipeline using Level-of-Detail (LOD) algorithms, reducing polygon count by 70% while maintaining visual fidelity

Implemented image optimization pipeline converting 50MB high-resolution drone captures to WebP format with progressive loading, achieving 85% load time reduction through PWA Web Worker background processing
Extracted GPS coordinates (altitude, latitude, longitude) from aerial photography EXIF metadata for automated geolocation
Integrated SK T Map API for real-time UAV position tracking with sub-second location updates on interactive map interface
Resolved AWS CloudFront CDN edge caching conflicts with Progressive Web App service worker cache strategies
Supported simultaneous monitoring and control of 50 concurrent drone operations with centralized fleet management dashboard

robotPlatform.title: LG Warehouse Robotics Fleet Management System
robotPlatform.subtitle: Scalable Control Platform with Custom Coordinate Transformation
content: Developed centralized control platform integrating with Yujin Robot Gateway API for real-time telemetry monitoring (status, position, battery levels) and command execution
Implemented responsive Progressive Web App supporting cross-platform deployment (mobile/desktop) with offline-capable functionality
Engineered proprietary M2PX (Meter-to-Pixel) coordinate transformation algorithm for accurate robot position rendering on multi-floor facility maps
Established bidirectional communication infrastructure using RabbitMQ message broker and AWS IoT Core MQTTS-over-WebSocket for low-latency device connectivity
Delivered comprehensive management interfaces including real-time dashboards, maintenance ticketing system, and alert notification history
Achieved sub-200ms average API response time maintaining 99.5% system uptime under production load
Resolved complex coordinate mapping challenges through reference implementation analysis, enabling per-floor map scaling for precise robot localization across 100+ autonomous mobile robots

inoutbox.title: Inoutbox Fashion Commerce Platform
inoutbox.subtitle: Seoul Fashion District B2B/B2C Marketplace | Solo Full-Stack Development
content: Architected end-to-end fashion commerce platform serving Seoul's Dongdaemun wholesale market, supporting 500+ vendor accounts and $2M annual GMV
Developed comprehensive B2C retail module with inventory management, sales tracking, order fulfillment, and logistics coordination
Implemented B2B wholesale features including product catalog management, POS system, credit account management, and bulk order processing
Built mobile procurement application in Flutter (iOS/Android) enabling rapid order placement and delivery tracking for buyers
Engineered RESTful API backend using Go-Gin framework with PostgreSQL database, achieving 99.9% uptime and sub-100ms response times
Developed responsive Vue.js web application and browser-based POS terminal with real-time inventory synchronization
Optimized thermal printer compatibility through device-specific DOM/CSS rendering, supporting 10+ printer models across retail locations
Established observability infrastructure integrating GCP Cloud Logging with Slack webhooks for real-time incident alerting
Deployed on Google Cloud Platform (Firebase Hosting, Cloud Functions, Firestore) with FCM push notification integration

campi.title: Campi Outdoor Recreation Social Platform
campi.subtitle: Flutter Application with Custom Image Processing Library
content: Developed social commerce platform connecting outdoor enthusiasts with campground reservations, user reviews, photo sharing, and gear marketplace features
Enabled content creators and influencers to monetize camping content through integrated e-commerce functionality
Engineered custom image editing library in Dart addressing early Flutter ecosystem gaps, implementing pinch-to-zoom, cropping, rotation, and flip transformations
Implemented sophisticated gesture recognition handling multi-touch events (scale, pan, drag) with real-time aspect ratio preservation and clipping boundaries
Achieved smooth 60fps image manipulation through optimized transformation matrix calculations and efficient canvas rendering
Deployed on Firebase infrastructure (Firestore, Cloud Storage, Hosting) with FCM push notifications for user engagement
Expanded technical expertise in Dart language internals and mobile graphics programming through library development

virtualTryOn.title: Virtual Try-On E-Commerce Solution
virtualTryOn.subtitle: Computer Vision Integration | Government-Funded Research Project
content: Developed web-based virtual fitting room leveraging computer vision models for garment visualization on customer photographs
Integrated three specialized neural networks for upper garments, lower garments, and footwear with unified REST API interface
Implemented Django backend service orchestrating model inference pipelines and managing image processing workflows
Built Vue.js interactive frontend enabling real-time garment selection and rendering with sub-2-second model inference latency
Collaborated closely with AI research team as solo full-stack developer, translating model requirements into production-ready web service
Delivered government-funded research project demonstrating 35% improvement in user engagement metrics for e-commerce partners

intellisysWebsite.title: Intellisys Corporate Website Redesign
intellisysWebsite.subtitle: Project Management & Vendor Coordination
content: Led full project lifecycle from vendor RFP selection through deployment and maintenance handoff for corporate website redesign
Managed project deliverables including work breakdown structure (WBS), requirements documentation, development sprints, and acceptance testing
Established effective collaboration protocols with external web development agency, conducting bi-weekly stakeholder reviews
Delivered project on-time and on-budget using Node.js, Express framework, and EJS templating engine for server-side rendering
Transitioned from project management to service management role, maintaining ongoing vendor relationships and content updates

coreProject.title: Core Project: Direct Sales Management System
